amendment.description: To increase the appropriation for the Office for Domestic Preparedness, Department of Homeland Security, by $2,330,000,000.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 514 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 123.

Amendment SA 514 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S4786, S4800-4803; text: CR S4786) To increase the appropriation for the Office for Domestic Preparedness, Department of Homeland Security, by $2,330,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 514 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 123.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 514 proposed by Senator Schumer.
